message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $95. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find it attractive.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $80. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value.
